description: Initialization file for the UniversalInit Environment Package, which manages environment variable mappings between frameworks and a common format.

methods.name: get_template_path
methods.description: Retrieve the template path used in environment variable mapping.

methods.name: parse_template_file
methods.description: Parse a given template configuration file.

methods.name: map_common_to_framework
methods.description: Map environment variables from a common format to a specific framework.

methods.name: map_framework_to_common
methods.description: Convert framework-specific environment variables to the common format.

methods.name: get_supported_frameworks
methods.description: Return a list of supported frameworks for environment variable mapping.

methods.name: apply_wildcard_mapping
methods.description: Apply wildcard rules to environment variable mappings.
